name: Off-Centre Remake (Fan Made)
description:
INFO

This is my remake version of the original game OFF-Centre by Lachlan Shelton but only made in 3 hours!!

Heres the stream to proof it

Also i guess this is the perfect time to celebrate the happy easter day with this game! Since yknow, thats a bunny and all- ok ima stop

The original game was made by Lachlan Shelton Give him a follow
